titles: Flanders, or the Spanish Netherlands, most accurately described shewing the several provinces, their bounds, dimensions, rivers ... and a large and exact description of the cities and who they are at present subject to : with a large and useful index of the cities ... rivers &c. in such a manner as may serve for a geographical dictionary for these parts : extraordinary necessary for the right understanding of these parts, the present wars and encampment of the Confederate and French armies.
author: Echard, Laurence, 1670?-1730.
notes: Attributed to Echard by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
keywords: Flanders --  Description and travel --  Early works to 1800.
Netherlands --  Description and travel --  Early works to 1800.
Belgium --  Description and travel --  Early works to 1800.
Luxembourg --  Description and travel --  Early works to 1800.
